title: Android Table of Elements
description1: Understanding what to learn and in what order to learn Android development can be confusing. So we created the Android Table of Elements to help students on their path to be a professional Android developer.
description2: Android tutorials have been organised into elements. Each element is part of a broader macro topic. Learn elements to become an expert in these macro topics and gradually build your skills from the top of the table to the bottom.
footerQuote: Nothing is better than reading and gaining more and more knowledge
